article: It was a Saturday. Mom 36 _ Betty to tidy her bedroom, where toys and clothes were _ everywhere on the floor. They _ for a whole morning and then Mom said, "But we still haven't found my purse." "Well, you should put things in good _ next time," Betty said seriously. "You are a clever monkey!" Mom _ and then asked "But what should I do, dear?" "Do it like this. It's easy," Betty said, got _ off the table into her arms, and then _ them all back into the drawer. Mom looked at Betty _ and said, "Are you sure you have put your things in order? Let's have a _ again." Betty followed _ into the room. Then they heard the cat's sound.
